article.headline: There's no good replacement for long-term care insurance
article.body: As I wrote last time, many fewer carriers are selling traditional long-term care insurance policies and premiums are higher than they used to be. People who bought those policies years ago recently have been hit with huge premium increases because policyholders held on longer than carriers expected and have collected huge payouts insurers hadn't prepared for.
